title: Descriptive Statistics
subject: Data Science
theory:
Describes the features of a dataset.
- **Central Tendency**: Where is the center? (Mean, Median).
- **Dispersion**: How spread out is it? (Variance, Std Dev, Range).
- **Shape**: Skewness, Kurtosis.

common_mistakes.mistake: Relying on Mean for skewed data
common_mistakes.correction: Bill Gates walks into a bar; on average everyone is a billionaire. Mean is sensitive to outliers. Median is robust.

summary: Standard statistics provide a summarized mental model of the data.
